title: The Running Man
description: Criminals, traitors, and enemies of the state risk death to win a trial by jury, suspended sentence, maybe even a full pardon. 400 square blocks, 4 game quads, three hours.
altHero: host Damon Killian surrounded by women
alt1: Killian raises his arms up excitedly
alt4: Buzzsaw uses his chainsaw on a piece of the set, setting off sparks
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
